DOC.criteria: CKD stag 3 4 ( estimate glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) 15 59 ) Diagnosis secondary hyperparathyroidism , define : Elevated intact PTH ( iPTH ) per KDIGO guideline : CKD stage 3 ( eGFR 3059 ) CKD stage 4 ( eGFR 1529 ) iPTH > Upper Limit Normal lab ( 6.8 pmol/L ) Presence Coronary Artery Calcium ( CAC > 0 ) Subject able complete study , best his/her knowledge iPTH > 1500 pg/ml Current previous use bisphosphonates History parathyroidectomy anticipate parathyroidectomy History cinacalcet use History solid organ transplant schedule date transplant surgery History coronary revascularization ( coronary artery bypass surgery percutaneous intervention ) History coronary artifact ( e.g . pacemaker , intracardiac defibrillator , artificial valve biventricular lead ) Active atrial fibrillation Weight great 300 pound ( due limitation equipment ) HIV positive Current pregnancy ( although pregnancy rare CKD population ) Life expectancy less two year judge primary physician Institutionalized patient ( nurse home prisoner ) Language barrier mental incapacity consent Inability swallow tablet current gastrointestinal disorder may associate impaired absorption orally administer medication .
